name: Jolam
content:
Jolam was a male Human who served as a sergeant in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Galactic War, he was stationed at the Jagged Plains Imperial Garrison on the Clabburn Tundra of the planet Hoth, distributing stimulants and medical supplies to other Imperial forces.
Sergeant Jolam appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Stims Vendor for Imperial players on Hoth.
